resources.string: Zeolr Technologies is a startup based out of New Delhi, India. The company was incorporated in Year 2016 and aims to add values to existing medical and healthcare products by integrating useful and affordable technologies.
Zeolrâ€™s first product, RespirON is an asthma & COPD management system.
Zeolr Technologies in the year 2016 received a pre-seed investment from Centre of Innovation Incubation Entrepreneurship, IIM - Ahmedabad.
314, Vishal Tower, Janakpuri District Center, Delhi - 110058
